title: Minna No Nihongo 1 DVD (Second Edition)
description:
These DVDs are updated audiovisual recordings of all the conversations found in the second edition of the Minna no Nihongo Main Texts. Being able to see the characters in the book speak in real situations greatly enhances the learner's ability to grasp the situation and meaning of the conversations, making these DVDs a great teaching aid.

Please note that only the Japanese language is used in the conversations and subtitles.

The DVDs are available both in NTSC and PAL format
